item.title: The Bruce Lee Method of Change
item.description: Bruce Lee's was wise beyond his years. During his short lived life he tested many theories and dispelled myths about how we live and act.

item.title: morning routine: revealing the 8 steps to start my day
item.description: “How you start your day is how you start your life” - Drew Canole Do you have a morning routine.

item.title: 8 Ideas to Make Your Performance Goal Setting a Breeze
item.description: Look for your choices, pick the best one, then go with it. ~Pat Riley Some love it. Some dread it.

item.title: 7 ideas to make 2015 an extraordinary year
item.description: "Sometimes we know the best thing to do, but fail to do it. New year's resolutions are often like that.
